couple.groom: IT geek, Brazilian Jiu Jitsu enthusiast and lover of everything cheese "specially the ones that smell like feet"
couple.bride: Half blood, Hungarian/Yemeni. Working as a Graphic Designer in a school where she obtained the title "Vampire"

countdown.celebration: We are so excited to celebrate with our family and friends

story.weirdos: Hugo & Krisz are a couple of a different kind, THIS IS NOT A TRADITIONAL LOVE STORY, you've been warned

1.title: How we met
1.content: They met in a library, when Hugo unexpectedly bumped into Krisz, causing her to drop all the books she was holding, and when they both went to pick them up, their eyes met, and it was love at first sight. True story, wallah.

2.title: Second Date
2.content: Of course we don't have a photo from our first date, so here's a photo from our second date, where we went to a questionable bar's Halloween party. Krisz went as a sexy witch and Hugo as Count Dracula.

3.title: Moved into Etihad Towers
3.content: Oh moving into Abu Dhabi's most iconic building was super awesome! We could watch the fog take over the city below us from the 36th floor.

4.title: Our First Christmas Together
4.content: We had a tiny Christmas with a ton of love and many many gifts.

5.title: Got Engaged
5.content: Krisz knew she was going to marry Hugo, when he showed her her cupboard in the kitchen and said: You can keep your d√©gueulasse coffee and mustard here.

6.title: France Won The World Cup
6.content: Unfortunately we couldn't be together on the day France held the world cup high, but we had the best time watching the semi finals together. It was an unforgetable day.

7.title: Moved Out of Etihad Towers
7.content: The sadest day of Hugo's life.

8.title: Got Married
8.content: It was the one and only time that Hugo was late and Krisz was early.

1.title: 6:00pm Cocktail hour
1.details: In France we will not waste time being sober, let's drink and dance and maybe we can bribe the band to play us some English songs.

2.title: 8:00pm Call to dinner
2.details: We'll go into a French Castle, sit on French chairs and Feast on French food, and of course there will be loads of Cheese!
